The video was archived by AFP Fact Check: a reputable source known for verifying and fact-checking information.
The video was shared on social media pla: including Facebook, with captions claiming it was footage from Beira, Mozambique.
The video features the voice of a local: mentioning the city of Kesennuma and a major tsunami warning issued on the coastline of Miyagi.
The same footage can be found on YouTube: posted in 2011, with a video description stating it was filmed in Kesennuma after the tsunami.
